channel.title: You nigga needs help
channel.description:
Well, I am being drug tested this monday
and I am going to test positive for many things..
What is a good thing to do to try to make it less chance of coming positive?
Thanks! Pko

[quote=“pko, post:82, topic:60833”]We were put in this big building, it was an alternate program from jail time.

We sat around in our rooms for a while, went outside, ate, excercised a few times a day, they taught us anti drug actions and stuff. Kinda like living in isolation from family and friends for a few months, but I made some new friends.[/quote]

item.title: You nigga needs help
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[quote=“therealjdb, post:76, topic:60833”][quote author=Rictoo link=topic=87686.msg940500#msg940500 date=1172400563]
I’ve never taken a drug test, but someone said in this topic that if the urine is too diluted, they will schedule the test for a later date. So why not piss in the cup a little, and then pour some water from the tap into it? =/
[/quote]
it all depends on the test. If its a lab test they might see the chemicals from the tap water, or temperature. When I’ve gotten pissed tested I just drank a lot of propel and then added a tiny bit of yellow food coloring lol.[/quote]

it was me who said that, and before it even goes to the lab they will do some form of colour test.

Read full topic

I’ve never taken a drug test, but someone said in this topic that if the urine is too diluted, they will schedule the test for a later date. So why not piss in the cup a little, and then pour some water from the tap into it? =/

it all depends on the test. If its a lab test they might see the chemicals from the tap water, or temperature. When I’ve gotten pissed tested I just drank a lot of propel and then added a tiny bit of yellow food coloring lol.

item.title: You nigga needs help
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[quote=“Whiskey, post:61, topic:60833”]Rofl. You really didn’t know what Poppy seeds are used for? Your going to test positive for sure now. Just say you ate loads of Poppy seeds because they are your favourite.

http://www.straightdope.com/classics/a5_116.html[/quote]

The testers really arnt going to “eh… like… poppies are my favourite food?”, when the person is already on suspicion of drug abuse 9hence having the tests.

Also about drinking all that water, if your piss isnt coloured enough from your sample (too dilute adn clear), then they will test you at a later date. Whatever happens dont let them have your first piss of the day, that is always the dirties with a whole nights worth of metabolic waste in it.

Read full topic
